===================
GeoSkailar Utilities
===================

.. module:: skailar.contrib.gis.utils
    :synopsis: GeoSkailar's collection of utilities.

The :mod:`skailar.contrib.gis.utils` module contains various utilities that are
useful in creating geospatial web applications.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2

    layermapping
    ogrinspect
    serializers
